content:
Hi Professor,

Hope you are doing well!

I find that I haven't received the score of my problem set 2 Checkoff yet. I remembered that I did Checkoff via Zoom last week. I forgot the name of the student who did the Checkoff for me, but she said that she would submit my score to the TA later. 

Thanks for helping this situation!

All the best,

Bingyu.
subject: PS2 Checkoff
